title: Lambda Deny Secrets to Network Actions
description: When building AWS Lambda functions that are connected to a customer-owned VPC, the functions execution role requires networking permissions that you may want to deny in your function code. This pattern describes an approach to denying thos actions.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: In this pattern, we explore an approach to deny access to networking configuration management operation from Lambda function code when the Lambda service requires those permissions to connect to a customer-owned VPC.
